Package co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.encryption

Interface EncryptionAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Android18AndAboveEncryptionAlgorithm, AndroidMAndAboveEncryptionAlgorithm, BelowAndroid18EncryptionAlgorithm
    public interface EncryptionAlgorithm
    This interface is for encrypting and decrypting data
